perturbation.original_text: We grant to you, upon the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement, the exclusive right to establish and operate a Franchised Business and a license to use the methods, procedures and products developed by us in the business of selling and servicing Unit Franchises in the territory described on Attachment A attached to this Agreement and incorporated into this Agreement by reference (the “Master Territory”). You shall operate the Franchised Business at or from a location of your choice within the Master Territory upon the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: We grant to you, upon the terms and conditions contained in this Agreement, the exclusive right to establish and operate a Franchised Business and a license to use the methods, procedures and products developed by us in the business of selling and servicing Unit Franchises in the territory described on Attachment A attached to this Agreement and incorporated into this Agreement by reference (the “Master Territory”). You shall operate the Franchised Business at or from any location as you see fit, both within and outside the Master Territory, subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The modification allows the franchisee to operate outside the defined "Master Territory," conflicting with the initial grant of "exclusive right" within that territory. This creates uncertainty about territorial rights, violating the intended exclusivity.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Common Law Principles of Contract Interpretation - Ambiguity and Contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: You shall devote all of your time, attention and best efforts to the Franchised Business pursuant to this Agreement and all work and services performed and/or supervised by you under this Agreement shall be performed and/or supervised by you or by your authorized employees. You shall adhere to all current established policies, practices and procedures of the System, and as the same may be amended from time to time, and shall not deviate therefrom without our prior written consent.
perturbation.changed_text: You shall devote reasonable time and effort, as you determine, to the Franchised Business, and work may be performed by anyone you designate. You shall generally follow our policies, practices, and procedures, but may deviate if you deem necessary for business purposes.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text contradicts the franchisee's obligation to devote "all of your time, attention and best efforts" by changing it to "reasonable time and effort." This introduces ambiguity and weakens franchisor control over operational standards.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Common Law Principles of Contract Interpretation - Good Faith and Fair Dealing.

perturbation.original_text: You shall maintain a safe and reasonably clean place of business in compliance with all governmental and industry standards and conduct the Franchised Business in a manner that generates goodwill and public approval of you and us.
perturbation.changed_text: You shall maintain the place of business in a condition that you consider meets basic safety and cleanliness standards and conduct the Franchised Business as you see fit.
perturbation.explanation: This change replaces specific compliance standards with subjective criteria, creating uncertainty regarding adherence to health and safety regulations and potentially damaging brand reputation. The original text enforces compliance with governmental and industry standards, which the modified text fails to do. This creates a contradiction that significantly reduces franchisor control.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Health and Safety Regulations; Trademark Law (Goodwill).
